info.title: Workspace Networking Communication Policy REST APIs

WorkspaceNetworkingCommunicationPolicy.description: The networking communication policy for a workspace.

inbound.description: The inbound network communications properties for a workspace.

outbound.description: The outbound network communications properties for a workspace.

InboundRules.description: The policy for all inbound communications to a workspace.

publicAccessRules.description: The policy for inbound communications to a workspace from public networks.

OutboundRules.description: The policy for all outbound communications from a workspace.

publicAccessRules.description: The policy for outbound communications to public networks from a workspace.

NetworkRules.description: The policy defining access to/from a workspace to/from public networks.

defaultAction.description: Default policy for workspace access from public networks.

DefaultAction.description: The default option for a network communications policy. Additional network connection defaults may be added over time.
